Rule: If `marital_status` is "Married", then the likelihood of earning more than $50k increases.
If `education` is "Doctorate", then the likelihood of earning more than $50k increases.
If `age` is higher (around 39), then the likelihood of earning more than $50k increases.
If `occupation` is "Other/Unknown" or "Sales", then the likelihood of earning more than $50k increases.
Being male leads to higher income.
Both higher and lower than average hours worked can lead to higher income.
If a person is Self-Employed instead of working in the Government sector, their income is predicted to be more than $50k.
